title: Mobile App Security
desc: Trendsoft services analyze and identify vulnerabilities in applications used with mobile platforms (iOS, Android, and Windows 10 Mobile) during or post-development. Many dissimilarities and impressions of techniques exist.

list.title: Three Fundamental tests under mobile AST

list2.desc: SAST: This statically analyzes the source, binary, or bytecode of an application to identify vulnerabilities.
Behavioral testing: This uses behavioral analysis to observe the behavior of the app during runtime and identify actions that could be exploited by an attacker.
DAST: This also uses dynamic analysis to test the app in its runtime state. DAST simulates attacks against an application and analyzes the application's reactions, reporting whether it is vulnerable.
